routeDeleteText: Do you want to remove the route from the platform?
motorbikeDeleteText: Do you want to remove the motorcycle from your profile?
logoutText: Are you sure you want to log out?
accountDeleteText: This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to delete your account?
routeJoinText: Do you want to unsubscribe from this route?
pwaText: Do you want to install the application for a better experience?
pwaTextIosSecond: in the browser and select 'Add to home screen' to install Kompitrail
notificactionTextEnabled: Activate notifications and receive a reminder 30 minutes before each departure.
notificationTextDisabled: You will no longer receive notifications before your routes. You can reactivate them whenever you want
